page.title: 06LOCAL FESTIVALS
page.content: OUR LOCAL FESTIVAL, IN EARLY SUMMER, IS CALLED THE WHIPMAN PLAY AND IS BASED AT WEST LINTON. IT STARTED ABOUT 100 YEARS AGO WHEN SOME HORSEMEN DECIDED TO FORM A MUTUAL BENEFIT SOCIETY. THEY HELD PLOUGHING COMPETITIONS AND CHOSE THE BEST CARTHORSE. NOWADAYS WE HAVE ALL SORTS OF RACES, COMPETITIONS FOR THE BEST DRESSED FLOAT, A FANCY DRESS PARADE AND TOSSING THE CABER. THERE IS ALSO A BONFIRE, BARBECUES AND DISCO DANCING. THERE IS LOTS OF FUN FOR EVERYONE. WE ELECT A WHIPMAN WHO HAS ONE YEAR OF OFFICE AND HE CHOOSES A LASS TO HELP HIM IN HIS DUTIES. IT IS AN HONOUR TO BE ELECTED WHIPMAN. THE PERSON CHOSEN MUST HAVE DONE SOMETHING WORTHWHILE FOR THE COMMUNITY. HE ALSO HAS TO BE ABLE TO RIDE A HORSE AND HAVE A PLEASING PERSONALITY TO REPRESENT OUR PARISH WHEN HE VISITS OTHER FETES.
